test_cases.title: Successful User Registration with Valid Email
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register using a valid email, strong password, and matching confirmation.
test_steps: Enter the same password in the confirm password field.
test_cases.expected_results: User is registered successfully and receives a verification email.

test_cases.title: Registration with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration with an invalid email format.
test_steps: Enter the same password in the confirm password field.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating invalid email format.

test_cases.title: Registration with Weak Password
test_cases.description: Verify that the system enforces password strength requirements during registration.
test_steps: Enter the same password in the confirm password field.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating password does not meet strength requirements.

test_cases.title: Registration with Non-matching Passwords
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration when password and confirm password do not match.
test_steps: Enter a different password in the confirm password field.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating passwords do not match.

test_cases.title: Registration with Already Used Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration with an email already used.
preconditions: User account already exists with email 'testuser@example.com'
test_steps: Enter the same password in the confirm password field.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating email is already in use.

test_cases.title: Successful Login with Correct Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in with correct email and password.
preconditions: User account exists with email and password
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login Attempt with Incorrect Password
test_cases.description: Verify that the system displays an error message for incorrect password.
preconditions: User account exists with email and password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for incorrect credentials.

test_cases.title: Login Attempt with Non-existent Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system displays an error for login attempts with an email not registered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for incorrect credentials.

test_cases.title: Login Lockout After Five Failed Attempts
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents login after five consecutive failed attempts.
preconditions: User account exists with email and password
test_steps: Attempt to log in again with correct credentials.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents login and displays lockout message.

test_cases.title: Password Reset Request
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can request a password reset link via email.
test_steps: Navigate to the password reset page.
Click the Request Reset Link button.
test_cases.expected_results: System sends a password reset link to the user's email.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Invalid Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not send a reset link for an unregistered email.
test_steps: Navigate to the password reset page.
Click the Request Reset Link button.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating email is not registered.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Weak New Password
test_cases.description: Verify that the system enforces password strength when resetting password.
preconditions: User has received password reset link
test_steps: Click the password reset link in email.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for weak password.

test_cases.title: Successful Password Reset
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can successfully reset password and receives confirmation.
preconditions: User has received password reset link
test_steps: Click the password reset link in email.
test_cases.expected_results: System updates password and sends confirmation.

test_cases.title: View Profile Information
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can view current profile information.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile page displays current user information.

test_cases.title: Edit and Save Profile Information
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can edit and save changes to profile fields.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile information is updated and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Invalid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates updated information before saving.
test_steps: Enter invalid dATF in a field (e.g., phone number with letters).
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message and does not save invalid dATF.

test_cases.title: Immediate Reflection of Profile Changes
test_cases.description: Verify that profile changes are reflected immediately on the profile page.
test_cases.expected_results: Changes appear instantly on the profile page.

test_cases.title: Upload Valid Profile Picture
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can upload a valid image file as profile picture.
test_steps: Navigate to profile picture upload section.
Select a valid image file (e.g., JPG under 2MB).
test_cases.expected_results: Profile picture is uploaded and displayed.

test_cases.title: Upload Invalid Profile Picture Format
test_cases.description: Verify that the system rejects invalid image formats.
test_steps: Navigate to profile picture upload section.
Select an invalid image file (e.g., PDF).
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid format.

test_cases.title: Upload Oversized Profile Picture
test_cases.description: Verify that the system rejects images exceeding size limit.
test_steps: Navigate to profile picture upload section.
Select an image file larger than allowed (e.g., 5MB).
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for file size.

test_cases.title: Remove Profile Picture
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can remove their profile picture.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile picture is removed and default image is displayed.

test_cases.title: Replace Profile Picture
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can replace their existing profile picture.
test_steps: Select a new valid image file.
test_cases.expected_results: New profile picture replaces the old one.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Access After Login
test_cases.description: Verify that user is redirected to dashboard after successful login.
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to dashboard.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Displays User-specific DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard shows personalized information.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays dATF specific to the logged-in user.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Navigation to Other Sections
test_cases.description: Verify that user can navigate to other sections from dashboard.
test_steps: Click on links to other sections (e.g., Profile, Search).
test_cases.expected_results: User is navigated to selected section.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Dynamic Update on Activity
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard updates dynamically based on user activity.
test_steps: Perform an activity that affects dashboard dATF (e.g., add favorite).
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard reflects changes immediately.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Displays Notifications and Alerts
test_cases.description: Verify that notifications and alerts are shown on dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Notifications and alerts are visible on dashboard.

test_cases.title: Search with Valid Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for items using valid keywords.
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant results are displayed.

test_cases.title: Search with No Matching Results
test_cases.description: Verify that system provides feedback when no results are found.
test_steps: Enter a keyword with no matching items.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays message indicating no results found.

test_cases.title: Search with Case-insensitive Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that search is case-insensitive.
test_cases.expected_results: Item 'Laptop' is displayed in results.

test_cases.title: Search with Partial Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that search supports partial matches.
test_cases.expected_results: Item 'Laptop' is displayed in results.

test_cases.title: Search Results Pagination
test_cases.description: Verify that search results are displayed in paginated format.
preconditions: More than one page of results exists
test_steps: Enter a keyword that returns many results.
test_cases.expected_results: Results are paginated and navigation works.

test_cases.title: Filter Search Results by Single Category
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter search results by selecting a category.
test_cases.expected_results: Results are updated based on selected filter.

test_cases.title: Filter Search Results by Multiple Categories
test_cases.description: Verify that user can combine multiple filters.
test_cases.expected_results: Results reflect all selected filters.

test_cases.title: Reset Search Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that user can reset all applied filters.
test_cases.expected_results: All filters are cleared and original results are displayed.

test_cases.title: Filter Results Load Without Page Refresh
test_cases.description: Verify that filtered results load dynamically without full page refresh.
test_cases.expected_results: Results update dynamically without page reload.

test_cases.title: View Item Details
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view detailed information about an item.
test_steps: Click on an item from search results.
test_cases.expected_results: Item details page displays all relevant information.

test_cases.title: Item Details Display Images and Specifications
test_cases.description: Verify that item details page displays images, descriptions, and specifications.
test_cases.expected_results: Images, descriptions, and specifications are displayed.

test_cases.title: Navigate Back to Search Results from Item Details
test_cases.description: Verify that user can return to search results from item details page.
test_steps: Click the Back to Results button.
test_cases.expected_results: User is returned to previous search results.

test_cases.title: Display Related Items on Item Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that related items are shown on item details page.
test_cases.expected_results: Related items are displayed.

test_cases.title: Add Item to Favorites from Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that user can mark an item as favorite from details page.
test_steps: Click the Add to Favorites button.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added to user's favorites list.

test_cases.title: View and Manage Favorites List
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view and manage their favorites list.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list displays items and allows removal.

test_cases.title: Favorites Persist Across Sessions
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites remain after user logs out and logs back in.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list contains previously added items.

test_cases.title: Receive Notification for Relevant Event
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives notifications for important updates.
preconditions: Relevant event occurs (e.g., new item added)
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is displayed on dashboard.

test_cases.title: Mark Notification as Read
test_cases.description: Verify that user can mark notifications as read.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification status changes to read.

test_cases.title: Enable and Disable Notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that user can enable or disable notifications.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification settings are updated accordingly.

test_cases.title: Admin View List of All Users
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view a list of all users.
test_cases.expected_results: List of all users is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit User Details
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit user details.
test_cases.expected_results: User details are updated and changes are logged.

test_cases.title: Admin Deactivate and Reactivate User Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can deactivate and reactivate user accounts.
test_cases.expected_results: User account status changes and actions are logged.

test_cases.title: Deactivated User Cannot Log In
test_cases.description: Verify that deactivated users are prevented from logging in.
test_steps: Attempt to log in with deactivated account.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents login.

test_cases.title: Admin Add New Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can add new items with required fields.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added and visible to users.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit Existing Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit item details.
test_cases.expected_results: Item details are updated and changes are reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: Admin Remove Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can remove items from platform.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is removed and no longer visible to users.

test_cases.title: Admin Add Item with Invalid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates item dATF before saving.
test_steps: Enter invalid dATF in required field.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not save item.

test_cases.title: Admin Access Analytics Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can access analytics dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Analytics dashboard is displayed.

test_cases.title: Analytics Dashboard Displays User Activity Metrics
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard shows user activity metrics.
test_cases.expected_results: User activity metrics are displayed.

test_cases.title: Analytics Dashboard Filters by Date Range
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can filter analytics by date range.
test_cases.expected_results: Analytics dATF updates to selected date range.

test_cases.title: User Access Support Contact Form
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access the support contact form.
test_cases.expected_results: Support contact form is displayed.

test_cases.title: Submit Support Query
test_cases.description: Verify that user can submit a query via support form.
test_cases.expected_results: System sends confirmation and query is sent to support team.

test_cases.title: View Status of Submitted Support Query
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view status of their submitted queries.
test_cases.expected_results: Status of each query is displayed.

test_cases.title: Change Password from Account Settings
test_cases.description: Verify that user can change password from account settings.
test_cases.expected_results: Password is changed and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Change Password with Incorrect Current Password
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates current password before allowing change.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not change password.

test_cases.title: User Logged Out from Other Sessions After Password Change
test_cases.description: Verify that user is logged out from other sessions after password change.
preconditions: User is logged in on multiple devices
test_steps: Attempt to perform action on another device session.
test_cases.expected_results: Other sessions are logged out and require re-login.

test_cases.title: Request Account Deletion
test_cases.description: Verify that user can request account deletion from settings.
test_cases.expected_results: System asks for confirmation before deletion.

test_cases.title: Confirm Account Deletion
test_cases.description: Verify that user dATF is permanently removed upon deletion.
test_cases.expected_results: Account is deleted, user receives email confirmation, and cannot log in.

test_cases.title: Multi-device Login
test_cases.description: Verify that user can log in from different devices.
test_cases.expected_results: User is logged in on both devices.

test_cases.title: Favorites and Settings Sync Across Devices
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites and settings are consistent on all devices.
preconditions: User is logged in on multiple devices
test_steps: Add item to favorites on device A.
Check favorites list on device B.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list is updated on both devices.

test_cases.title: Log Out Remotely from Any Device
test_cases.description: Verify that user can log out remotely from any device.
preconditions: User is logged in on multiple devices
test_steps: Initiate remote log out from device A for device B.
Attempt to perform action on device B.
test_cases.expected_results: Device B is logged out and requires re-login.

test_cases.title: Receive Email Alert for Account Change
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives email alert for account changes.
test_cases.expected_results: Email alert is received for account change.

test_cases.title: Manage Email Alert Preferences
test_cases.description: Verify that user can manage preferences for email alerts.
test_cases.expected_results: Email alert preferences are updated.

test_cases.title: Unsubscribe from Email Alerts
test_cases.description: Verify that user can unsubscribe from email alerts.
preconditions: User is subscribed to email alerts
test_cases.expected_results: User is unsubscribed and no further alerts are sent.

test_cases.title: Platform Supports Screen Readers
test_cases.description: Verify that platform supports standard screen readers.
test_steps: Open platform with a screen reader enabled.
test_cases.expected_results: Screen reader reads all interactive elements and content.

test_cases.title: Keyboard Navigation for All Interactive Elements
test_cases.description: Verify that all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.
test_steps: Navigate through platform using keyboard (Tab, Enter, etc.).
Attempt to interact with buttons, links, forms.
test_cases.expected_results: All interactive elements are accessible and usable via keyboard.

test_cases.title: Images Have Descriptive Alt Text
test_cases.description: Verify that all images have descriptive alt text for accessibility.
test_steps: Inspect images on platform using browser tools.
Check alt attribute for each image.
test_cases.expected_results: All images have meaningful alt text.

test_cases.title: Contrast Ratios Meet Accessibility Guidelines
test_cases.description: Verify that contrast ratios on platform meet accessibility standards.
test_steps: Use accessibility testing tool to measure contrast ratios.
test_cases.expected_results: Contrast ratios meet WCAG guidelines.

test_cases.title: User Can Adjust Font Sizes for Readability
test_cases.description: Verify that user can adjust font sizes for better readability.
test_cases.expected_results: Font size changes are reflected across platform.

summary: 76 comprehensive test cases were generated covering all user stories and requirements, including positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for user registration, login, password management, profile management, dashboard, search and filter, item details, favorites, notifications, admin features, support, security, multi-device access, email alerts, and accessibility.
